metadata.title: CVE-2022-1097 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NSSToken objects were referenced via direct points, and couldhave been accessed in an unsafe way on different threads, leading to ause-after-free and potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerabilityaffects Thunderbird < 91.8, Firefox < 99, and Firefox ESR < 91.8.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
